description: Handles user-related operations such as registration, login, and profile management.
Manages operations related to product listings, including CRUD operations for products.
Handles order processing, order status updates, and order history retrieval.
Manages payment processing and transactions, including refunds and payment status.

Generates reports based on various data points such as sales statistics and user activity.
